title: Imp

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You choose someone to kill each night.
- If you kill yourself, a player you can win with becomes your role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Cult of the Clocktower win the game.
Icon URL: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1183302777733140501/1183312121434492958/Icon_imp.png?ex=6587e04a&is=65756b4a&hm=4d657743a4657e7a98330b7ee50bb22e5ef3a3cdb46d6c9080fc1a56915ed7c3&

desc:
Post 4580
*"We must keep our wits sharp and our sword sharper. Evil walks among us, and will stop at nothing to destroy us good, simple folk, bringing our fine town to ruin. Trust no-one. But, if you must trust someone, trust me."*
